events.name: Learn to go green
events.description: Join us for an inspiring session on sustainable living at Lyf Ginza! Discover practical ways to incorporate eco-friendly habits into your daily routine. This event is perfect for anyone looking to make a positive impact on the environment.

events.name: Art Therapy Workshop
events.description: Unwind and express yourself creatively at our Art Therapy Workshop. Guided by professionals, this session will help you de-stress and explore therapeutic art techniques in a relaxed atmosphere at Lyf Ginza.

events.name: Wine Tasting
events.eventLocation: Lyf CollingWood Melbourne - Art Studio Room

events.name: Cooking Class: Vegan Dishes
events.description: Discover the joys of plant-based cooking! Join our vegan cooking class at Lyf Ginza and learn how to create delicious, nutritious dishes that are kind to both your body and the planet.

events.name: Yoga & Meditation
events.description: Recharge and find inner peace with our rooftop Yoga & Meditation session at Lyf Ginza. This session will guide you through mindful practices that help reduce stress and increase mental clarity.

events.name: Tech Innovation
events.description: Get a glimpse into the future of technology at our Tech Innovation event. Held at Lyf Funan, this event showcases cutting-edge advancements and the latest trends in the tech world. Perfect for tech enthusiasts and innovators!
